Html:
Hi,

Do you support the GDirections functionality? If so, can you please give me some example on how to use this to draw a route along a road if I provide some points?

Thanks

Without a doubt, this is absolutley, positively one of the best (if not the best) win forms controls I have had the pleasure of using. Thank you radioman!

That being said, I think there may be a small bug with the GMapControl.Overlays.RemoveAt function - it doesn't seem to do anything (so I just used Remove instead and that works fine). In any case, excellent control!
thanks ;} keep in mind there is WPF support also!
